column1: #Text=I told you I could do it .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Sorry I ever doubted you .
#Text=" Korra says : " We ca n't wait for the President to act .
#Text=" Asami says : " And my company is about to go under .
#Text=I have to find a way to make some sales .
#Text=You 're about to get an inside look at how Varrick Global Industries stays at the forefront of imagination innovation , or " imagivation " !
#Text=We do n't need the President to go to the South .
#Text=If there 's one thing I know about troops , it 's that they love fighting .
#Text=" Korra says : " I know General Iroh .
#Text=He might be willing to help us .
#Text=" Varrick says : " A man on the inside .
#Text=And you need to sell some mecha tanks .
#Text=I know some people who need them .
#Text=You 'll be making money for your company and you 'll be helping to defeat Unalaq .
#Text=If you ca n't make money during a war , you just flat - out can not make money .
#Text=" Asami says : " It 's dangerous on the seas right now , but I 'm willing to try if you are .
#Text=" Varrick says : " It 'll be crazy risky , but I love crazy risky !
#Text=Zhu Li , get those other ideas to research and development .
#Text=" Korra says : " I do n't understand why it 's so hard to get Republic City to support the South .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Do n't worry , I 'm already working on that .
#Text=As soon as people see this , they 'll be lining up to fight Unalaq .
#Text=Zhu Li , do the , uh -- the thing .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Do n't freak out .
#Text=" Varrick says : " I had a film crew documenting the entire Northern invasion .
#Text=" Varrick says : " We 're gon na cut this footage together with scenes we shoot of our superstar Bolin here playing a Southern Water Tribe hero battling the evil Unalaq .
#Text=No one will root for the North after they see " The Adventures of Nuktuk : Hero of the South " !
